movie.title: Nancy Drew and the Hidden Staircase
movie.title_english: Nancy Drew and the Hidden Staircase
movie.title_long: Nancy Drew and the Hidden Staircase (2019)
movie.description_intro: A bit of an outsider struggling to fit into her new surroundings, Nancy and her pals set out to solve a mystery, make new friends, and establish their place in the community.
movie.description_full: A bit of an outsider struggling to fit into her new surroundings, Nancy and her pals set out to solve a mystery, make new friends, and establish their place in the community.

movies.title: On the Record
movies.summary: A former hip hop executive decides whether to make public her rape by one of the most powerful men in the music industry.
movies.description_full: A former hip hop executive decides whether to make public her rape by one of the most powerful men in the music industry.
movies.synopsis: A former hip hop executive decides whether to make public her rape by one of the most powerful men in the music industry.

movies.title: Rundfunk: Jachterwachter
movies.summary: A hard-working guy runs the HIVO-campsite without any assistance. The sudden arrival of faded celebrity Ronnie Bosboom Jr. seems like a blessing at first, but when he reveals to be hiding from criminals, things quickly go awry. The duo must learn to work together to save the camping and their lives.
movies.description_full: A hard-working guy runs the HIVO-campsite without any assistance. The sudden arrival of faded celebrity Ronnie Bosboom Jr. seems like a blessing at first, but when he reveals to be hiding from criminals, things quickly go awry. The duo must learn to work together to save the camping and their lives.

movies.title: Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen
movies.summary: Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen (2015) is about the story of Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen who love derby race want to do the last battle with Yakuza guys.
movies.description_full: Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen (2015) is about the story of Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen who love derby race want to do the last battle with Yakuza guys.
movies.synopsis: Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen (2015) is about the story of Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen who love derby race want to do the last battle with Yakuza guys.

movies.title: Yes Man
movies.summary: Carl Allen is at a standstill. No future - until the day he enrolls into a personal development program based on a very simple idea: say yes to everything. Carl discovers with amazement the magical power of "Yes", and sees his professional and romantic life turned upside down overnight: an unexpected promotion and a new girlfriend. But he'll soon discover that better can be good's enemy, and that not all opportunities should be taken.
